thread.title: Nerissa Ambegia
thread.title_full: Precision Tax Relief reviewed by Nerissa Ambegia

author: Nerissa Ambegia
title: Nerissa Ambegia
text: First thanks to Mr. Ben Lou from Debt Aid Consulting who referred us to Precision Tax Relief who listened to our IRS situation & acted on it right away..in just a short time the personnel fr. Precision Tax Relief esp. Mr Lyle Mullerleile, Tax Case Coordinator n his team were able to work for an Offer in Compromise w/ the IRS..we really did'nt expect such a great result..thanks so much for taking away our worries & burdens fr. our shoulders..may more people w/ the same problems be benefited fr. your best service & concerns..Sincerely...NFA & EAA ..CALIFORNIA
